title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
OB: The files in the MRU (most recently used) list in the File menu are not saved and reappear after restarting the workbench. This list should persist between workbench sessions.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
